CustomField.formula: IF(Registration_Type__c = "Car Wash", "IT IS ILLEGAL TO OPERATE AS A CAR WASHING & POLISHING BUSINESS unless you have a registration in your possession. Violators shall be guilty of a misdemeanor.", IF(Registration_Type__c = "Garment Manufacturers and Contractors", "IT IS ILLEGAL TO OPERATE A GARMENT MANUFACTURING/CONTRACTING INDUSTRY BUSINESS unless you have a registration in your possession. Violators shall be guilty of a misdemeanor.", IF(Registration_Type__c = "Farm Labor Contractor", "IT IS ILLEGAL TO OPERATE AS A FARM LABOR CONTRACTOR unless you have a valid license in your possession. Violators are guilty of a misdemeanor, punishable by a fine of not more than $1,000.00 or imprisonment in the county jail for no more than six (6) months or both.", IF(Registration_Type__c = "Child Performer Services", "IT IS ILLEGAL TO PROVIDE CERTAIN CHILD PERFORMER SERVICES unless you have a permit in your possession. Violators shall be guilty of a misdemeanor.", IF(Registration_Type__c = "Talent Agency", "IT IS ILLEGAL TO ENGAGE IN OR CARRY ON THE OCCUPATION OF A TALENT AGENCY without procuring a license from the Labor Commissioner.", "")))))
CustomField.label: Defect Text 2
